channel.title: Gta san andreas PC - Playing online?
channel.description: I know you can, during the installation it asked for me to register and i clicked later, but i dont know what link that was, help?

item.title: Gta san andreas PC - Playing online?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Multi San Andres?
Play a gta p-server.

Read full topic
item.source: Gta san andreas PC - Playing online?

item.title: Gta san andreas PC - Playing online?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:178868”][quote author=exps35 link=topic=239906.msg2034785#msg2034785 date=1202278285]
its called San Andreas: Multi-Player, or Samp.

http://www.sa-mp.com/

It’s not registered with rockstar, or affiliated in any way, so I’m not really sure what asked you register. Maybe it was just asking to send your CD-key.
[/quote]
It said would you like to register with san andreas online during the installation, anyway, is this samp the thing that people talk about ‘multiplayer’ on the menu?[/quote]
the register with SA online during install is just asking if u want to register the game with Rockstar (for warranty or something, most games now ask you.) Just say no. Its not MP

Read full topic
item.source: Gta san andreas PC - Playing online?
